name: GOSKY Holding
description: Developer of social customer relationship management software (CRM) intended to improve marketing accuracy and efficiency. The company applies artificial intelligence technology for R&D of social CRM, its main products include member loyalty platform, marketing chatbot and advertisement deployment, enabling brands to convert their social media followers into prospective customers in a convenient way.
